When multiple sellers sell the same product through a single detail page, we combine and present the best product data to ensure customers get the best experience

Your image recommendations

Upload your recommendations for product images

Hide Image Guidelines
  • Choose images that are clear, information-rich and attractive.
  • Products must fill at least 85% of the image
  • Images must show only the products that is for sale, with few or no props and with no logos,watermarks, or inset images.
  • Images must be at least 1000 pixels on the longest side and at least 500 pixels on the shortest side to be zoom-able.
  • Images must not exceed 10000 pixels on the longest side.
